text: Gabriel Hottegindre (born 26 November 1979) is a Uruguayan alpine skier. He represented his country at the 1998 Winter Olympics in Nagano, Japan, where he placed 24th in the men's slalom race. == References == Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Uruguay Category:Alpine skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics
title: Gabriel Hottegindre
